price: Basi hakika mimi hapo nitakuwa katika upotovu ulio dhaahiri.
footnotes: Basi hakika mimi nikiiabudu miungu mingine badala yake Yeye, nitakuwa katika upotovu ulio dhaahiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
